short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A joking perspective shift on NFTs. Virtually guaranteed to be broken in some way.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome text replacement tool which changes references in webpages from "NFT" to "Tulip Bulb". Very much a tongue-in-cheek extension.
